adversarial_tree_verification_bound.explanation: Lower bound on minimum adversarial distortion averaged over all test samples. Larger is better. Chen, Hongge, et al. 'Robustness verification of tree-based models.' arXiv preprint arXiv:1906.03849 (2019).

adversarial_tree_verification_error.explanation: Upper bound of error for adversarial examples with L_infinity perturbation of specified size. From Chen, Hongge, et al. 'Robustness verification of tree-based models.' arXiv preprint arXiv:1906.03849 (2019).
